hero.title: Transform Your Advertising with AI
hero.subtitle: Create high-performing ad campaigns in minutes with artificial intelligence

problem.title: The Problem
problem.subtitle: Small businesses lose thousands on ineffective advertising
problem.description: 83% of small businesses fail to create ads that convert. This costs an average of €5,000 per year in wasted advertising.

issues.timeManagement: You spend hours managing Google Ads

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: No features first — concrete results. Here's how Flipika transforms your Google Ads approach.

aiGeneration.title: AI Ad Generation
aiGeneration.description: Create optimized ads in seconds with our advanced AI technology

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Track your campaign performance with our detailed dashboard

optimization.title: Continuous Optimization
optimization.description: Our AI automatically optimizes your campaigns for better results

createCampaigns.title: Launch campaigns instantly
createCampaigns.subtitle: From a simple brief
createCampaigns.description: No more hours of setup. Describe your goal and Flipika generates a complete, optimized campaign.

autoOptimize.title: Continuous auto-optimization
autoOptimize.subtitle: Bids, budgets and keywords
autoOptimize.description: Your AI media buyer automatically adjusts your campaigns 24/7 to maximize your performance.

boostRoas.title: Boost your ROAS
boostRoas.subtitle: With continuous AI learning
boostRoas.description: The more Flipika manages your campaigns, the more performant it becomes. Every data improves your results.

actionableInsights.title: Actionable insights
actionableInsights.subtitle: No setup, no agency
actionableInsights.description: Receive clear and precise recommendations to improve your performance, directly in your dashboard.

differentiation.title: Why Choose Us?
differentiation.subtitle: Not just another AI toolbox
differentiation.description: What distinguishes us from generic solutions
differentiation.item1: AI specifically designed for local advertising

notCopywritingTool.title: Not another AI copywriting tool
notCopywritingTool.subtitle: A real media buyer
notCopywritingTool.description: Flipika doesn't just generate text. It analyzes, optimizes and manages your campaigns like an expert with 10 years of experience.

designedForMediaBuyers.title: Designed for Media Buyers
designedForMediaBuyers.subtitle: Not for content creators
designedForMediaBuyers.description: Every feature is designed to maximize your ROAS, not to create Instagram posts.

usesRealData.title: Uses YOUR real Google Ads data
usesRealData.subtitle: Not generic prompts
usesRealData.description: Flipika connects directly to your Google Ads account for optimizations based on your real metrics.

learnsAndImproves.title: Learns and improves with every campaign
learnsAndImproves.subtitle: Evolutionary AI
learnsAndImproves.description: The more you use Flipika, the more it understands your business and optimizes according to your specific goals.

differentiation.ctaSubtitle: Discover why Media Buyers choose Flipika

comparison.title: Flipika vs Other AI Tools

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real results for businesses like yours

pierre.name: Pierre D.
pierre.content: I joined Flipika's beta 3 months ago. Result: +340% ROAS on my Google Ads campaigns. The AI really understands performance marketing.

marie.name: Marie L.
marie.content: Flipika took me from 50k€ to 500k€ in managed revenue per month. The automation saves me 20h/week that I can dedicate to my other clients.

julien.name: Julien R.
julien.content: We tested 3 agencies before Flipika. Nothing worked as well. Our CPA dropped 60% in 2 months. It's like having a full-time Google Ads expert.

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to use our site, you accept our use of cookies.

generalInfo.title: 1. General Information
generalInfo.content: The present website is published by Flipika, a simplified joint stock company with capital of 1,000 euros, registered with the Paris Trade and Companies Register under number 123 456 789.

hosting.title: 2. Hosting
hosting.content: The website is hosted by Google Cloud Platform,
hosting.address: Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content1: All content on the website (texts, images, videos, logos, trademarks, etc.) is protected by French and international intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.content2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, adaptation or exploitation, even partial, of this content is strictly prohibited without prior written permission from Flipika.

personalData.title: 4. Personal Data
personalData.content1: Personal data collected on the website is used solely within the framework of services provided by Flipika, in accordance with our privacy policy.
personalData.content2: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict, port, and object to your personal data.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: The website uses cookies to improve user experience. By browsing the website, you accept the use of these cookies. You can configure your cookie preferences at any time.

liability.title: 6. Liability Limitation
liability.content1: Flipika strives to provide information as accurate as possible on the website, but cannot be held responsible for any error, omission or inaccuracy.
liability.content2: The website user acknowledges having verified the compatibility of their computer equipment with the website and that their technical capabilities allow access and error-free use of the website and its services.

applicableLaw.title: 7. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
applicableLaw.content: These legal notices are subject to French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought. Failing that, the courts of Paris will have sole jurisdiction.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these legal notices or the website in general, you can contact us at: legal@flipika.com

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Flipika, protecting your personal data is our priority. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your information in accordance with the GDPR and applicable data protection laws.

whoWeAre.title: 2. Who we are
whoWeAre.content: The controller of your personal data is:
whoWeAre.address: Registered office: 123 Innovation Street, 75001 Paris, France

dataCollected.title: 3. Data collected
dataCollected.connectionData: Connection data: IP address, browser type, login logs
dataCollected.usageData: Usage data: pages visited, time spent on the site
dataCollected.commercialData: Commercial data: information about your use of our services

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal basis
legalBasis.content: We process your data on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.consent: Consent: for sending newsletters and marketing communications
legalBasis.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest: to improve our services and prevent fraud
legalBasis.legalObligation: Legal obligation: to comply with accounting and tax obligations

dataUsage.title: 5. Data use
dataUsage.analytics: Analyze site usage and improve user experience

dataRetention.title: 6. Data retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:
dataRetention.accountData: Account data: duration of the contract + 5 years

dataSharing.title: 7. Data sharing
dataSharing.content:
We never sell your personal data. It may be shared with:
  • Technical providers (hosting, email, analytics)
  • Legal authorities (upon legal request)
  • Successors in case of business transfer

All our partners are subject to strict confidentiality obligations.

dataSecurity.title: 8. Data security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction. These measures include: data encryption, firewalls, restricted access, regular backups, and staff training.

yourRights.title: 9. Your rights
yourRights.content: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
yourRights.accessRight: Right of access: obtain a copy of your data
yourRights.rectificationRight: Right to rectification: correct your inaccurate data
yourRights.erasureRight: Right to erasure: request deletion of your data
yourRights.portabilityRight: Right to portability: receive your data in a structured format
yourRights.oppositionRight: Right to object: object to the processing of your data
yourRights.limitationRight: Right to restriction: restrict the processing of your data
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@flipika.com or by mail at the address above.

cookies.title: 10. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. The cookies used include:
cookies.essentialCookies: Essential cookies: necessary for the functioning of the site
cookies.manage: You can configure your cookie preferences at any time via our cookie management tool.

internationalTransfers.title: 11. International transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred to countries outside the EU when using certain services (Google Cloud, etc.). These transfers are protected by standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission.

policyChanges.title: 12. Policy changes
policyChanges.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be published on this page with the update date. We will inform you by email of significant changes.

contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your personal data, you can contact us:
contact.address: Postal address: Flipika - Privacy, 123 Innovation Street, 75001 Paris
contact.cnil: You also have the right to file a complaint with the CNIL: www.cnil.fr

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Flipika website (the "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Service.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content1: Flipika provides a platform for automation and optimization of Google Ads campaigns using artificial intelligence. The Service includes access to our platform, analysis tools, and recommendations generated by our AI.
serviceDescription.content2: The Service is provided "as is" and may be modified, suspended or discontinued at any time without notice.

accessConditions.title: 3. Access Conditions
accessConditions.content: Use of the Service requires the creation of a user account. You agree to:
list: Provide accurate, complete and up-to-date information when registering
Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials
Be responsible for all activities carried out under your account
Inform us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

authorizedUse.title: 4. Authorized Use
authorizedUse.content: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. It is prohibited to:
list: Use the Service in a way that violates applicable laws
Transmit viruses, malware or any malicious code
Attempt to access unauthorized areas of the Service
Use robots, spiders or other automated means without authorization
Collect personal data of other users without consent
Use the Service for spam or unsolicited communications
Display, copy or download unauthorized portions of the Service
Bypass or disable the Service's security measures

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content1: The Service and its original content (except user-generated content), features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Flipika and its licensors.
intellectualProperty.content2: The Service is protected by copyright, trademarks and other laws. No part of the Service may be copied, modified, distributed, sold or exploited without our prior written consent.

userData.title: 6. User Data
userData.content1: You retain ownership of any content you submit, post or display through the Service. By submitting this content, you grant Flipika a worldwide, non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free license to use, copy, modify, distribute and display this content as part of the Service.
userData.content2: You represent and warrant that: (i) you own the rights to the content or have the right to publish it, and (ii) the content does not violate third-party rights or applicable laws.

googleAdsAccounts.title: 7. Google Ads Accounts
googleAdsAccounts.content: When you connect your Google Ads accounts to Flipika, you authorize our platform to:
list: Generate recommendations and optimizations based on your data
Apply optimizations to your campaigns with your consent

pricingBilling.title: 8. Pricing and Billing
pricingBilling.content1: The pricing conditions for the Service are described on our website and may be modified at any time. Any change will be communicated before taking effect.
pricingBilling.content2: Invoices are payable upon receipt. In case of non-payment, Flipika reserves the right to suspend access to the Service until regularization.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content1: We may suspend or terminate access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
termination.content2: You may terminate your use of the Service at any time by closing your account or contacting support.

liability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
liability.content1: Flipika shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of or inability to use the Service.
liability.content2: We strive to maintain a high level of availability, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free access to the Service.

changes.title: 11. Changes to the Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the update date.

serviceChanges.title: 11. Service Changes
serviceChanges.content: Flipika reserves the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Service or any part of it with or without notice. Flipika will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension or discontinuation of the Service.

applicableLaw.title: 12. Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: These Terms are governed by French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought. Failing that, the courts of Paris will have jurisdiction.

generalProvisions.title: 14. General Provisions
generalProvisions.content1: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Flipika regarding the Service and supersede all prior or contemporaneous agreements, written or oral.
generalProvisions.content2: If any provision of these Terms is found invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in effect. The failure of Flipika to exercise or enforce any right or provision does not constitute a waiver.

contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, you can contact us at:
